https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7Cvsi3bSk05HhgJ3o5jexZ1gVCj.jpg Akari finds herself nervous coaching a new undine as a Prima, until she awakens to find that it is just a dream. To soothe her worries, Alicia recalls stories of her beginnings as a Prima, as well as the memories she made. Aria the OVA: Arietta
